articles.title: Sony is dropping PlayStation 5 and PS4 Twitter integration next week - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Sony is dropping Twitter integration from its PlayStation consoles starting next Monday, 13th November, mirroring simil…
articles.content:
Sony is dropping Twitter integration from its PlayStation consoles starting next Monday, 13th November, mirroring similar decisions made by Xbox and Blizzard earlier this year.
Twitter (or X, if you… [+1701 chars]

articles.title: 'Oceans are hugely complex': modelling marine microbes is key to climate forecasts - Nature.com
articles.description: Microorganisms are the engines that drive most marine processes. Ocean modelling must evolve to take their biological complexity into account.
